last_episode_to_air.name: Blood Debt
last_episode_to_air.overview: Wulan and Esa face Munik, the black magic shaman behind the curses. She then reveals a secret which made them learn a piece of their parents' past.

name: Blood Curse
overview: A young woman witnessing black magic attack on her family which changes her view towards the world. Driven to protect them at any cost, the woman will go to the ends of the earth to find out who is responsible and hold them to account.

episodes.name: The Parcel
episodes.overview: Ever since receiving a mysterious "delivery," Wulan's family's life is never the same again. Mr Bondan is terrorised by an invisible entity.

episodes.name: Bloody Anniversary
episodes.overview: Wulan gets harassed by Reno, her ex-fiance. Esa finds proof that his father called Mr Ahmad moments before he died.

episodes.name: Retribution
episodes.overview: As Mr Ahmad is rushed to the hospital, Mrs Rima, his ex-wife, keeps haranguing Mrs Astuti for money. Wulan finally meets Esa.

episodes.name: Signs
episodes.overview: Grief clouds over Wulan's family. Wulan and Esa catch Reno and Mr Harna planting a mysterious object in front of Wulan's house.

episodes.name: The Uninvited Guests
episodes.overview: Wulan finally allows Reno to help her. Mr Harna goes on an astral journey to track down the origins of the curse.

episodes.name: The Flower Withers
episodes.overview: Wulan struggles with Reno's death. Wisnu falls deeper in his addiction. Ridho, a mysterious figure from Mr Ahmad and Mr Bondan's past, appears.

episodes.name: Double Identity
episodes.overview: Wulan and Wisnu are shaken from Mrs Astuti's death. Wisnu finds out that Harun is Ridho's neighbour and manages to unveil Harun's dangerous secret.

episodes.name: Reckoning
episodes.overview: Wulan, Esa, Wisnu and Ridho band together to look for Harun. Along with Wulan, Esa tries to get more information out of Harun before Ridho kills him.

episodes.name: The Source
episodes.overview: With Atik's guidance, Wulan and Esa find Gatot, Ridho's old friend. Tragedy strikes before the identity of the black magic shaman is revealed.

episodes.name: Blood Debt
episodes.overview: Wulan and Esa face Munik, the black magic shaman behind the curses. She then reveals a secret which made them learn a piece of their parents' past.
